snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.name: Animation Manager

list.desc:
Enter in a list of animation categories.
Animations that are higher up will override
the ones below it.
list.name: _CategoryHierarchy

number.desc: Set the amount of time the screen will fade after falling in. In and Out will be the same.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc:
Set this to how long you wish to wait before reloading the scene.
Useful for displaying a Spawned Actor on Death animation so it completes before the reload.
number.name: _TimeBeforeReload

snippet.desc: This Behavior controls the player's jumping.
snippet.description: This Behavior controls the player's jumping.
snippet.name: Jumping

control.desc: Select the key used for jumping.
control.name: _JumpKey

number.desc:
Maximum amount of time that the
jump force will be applied when holding down the jump button.

default = 0.075
number.name: _MaxJumpTime

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the right.
animation.name: _JumpRightAnimation

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the left.
animation.name: _JumpLeftAnimation

number.desc:
When releasing the jump key before reaching the max
height, what is the rate of upward slowdown?

default = 0.75
number.name: _JumpingSlowdown

number.desc:
Amount of force applied when jumping.
Default = 35
number.name: _JumpForce

snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for slowing the player down when no direction keys are being pressed.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for slowing the player down when no direction keys are being pressed.
snippet.name: Slowdown

control.desc: Select the control used to move to the right.
control.name: _RightKey

control.desc: Select the control used to move to the left.
control.name: _LeftKey

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while on the ground.

default = 0.9
number.name: _GroundSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while in the air.

default = 0.99
number.name: _AirSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while ducking.

default = 0.975
number.name: _DuckingSlowdown

number.desc:
Rate of slowdown while moving through the air.

default = 0.975
number.name: _MovingAirSlowdown

number.desc:
Amount of horizontal slowdown while in the water
default = 0.95
number.name: _WaterSlowdown

snippet.desc: When this explosion is created, it will grow bigger or smaller depending on what percent of zoom you use. Then fade out.
snippet.description: When this explosion is created, it will grow bigger or smaller depending on what percent of zoom you use. Then fade out.
snippet.name: Zoom in Explosion

number.desc: Set this to zoom an explosion in or out. In is a default of 100%
number.name: _ZoomSize

number.desc: How long it takes to zoom in or out to the specified size.
number.name: _ZoomTime

snippet.desc: Used to award health with health pickup items.
snippet.description: Used to award health with health pickup items.
snippet.name: Award Health upon Collision

snippet.desc: This Behavior determines if the player is on the ground and sets an Actor Level Attribute as appropriate.
snippet.description: This Behavior determines if the player is on the ground and sets an Actor Level Attribute as appropriate.
snippet.name: On Ground

boolean.desc: Only detect that the player is on the ground if standing on a tile?
boolean.name: _LimitToTiles

list.desc: If not limited to tiles, enter in any Actor Group that you want to exclude from ground collisions.
list.name: _ExcludedGroups

snippet.desc: Reload the scene if an actor with this behavior has it's health depleted. Requires the Health behvaior to function correctly.
snippet.description: Reload the scene if an actor with this behavior has it's health depleted. Requires the Health behvaior to function correctly.
snippet.name: Reload Scene on Death

number.desc: How many seconds should you wait before starting the reload?
number.name: _Delay

number.desc: Number of seconds for the fade out transition.
number.name: _FadeOutTime

number.desc: Number of seconds for the scene to fade back in after reloading.
number.name: _FadeInTime

number.desc: The total number of weapons available to the player.
number.name: _NumberofWeapons

snippet.desc: Fires projectiles at the player from an enemy.
snippet.description: Fires projectiles at the player from an enemy.
snippet.name: Enemy Fire Projectile

number.desc: How frequently should the enemy fire at the player? (In Seconds)
number.name: _Delay

snippet.desc: This behavior periodically updates the X and Y position of the player in global variables. Those variables are used so that enemies and other actors can easily determine where the player is in order to shoot him.
snippet.description: This behavior periodically updates the X and Y position of the player in global variables. Those variables are used so that enemies and other actors can easily determine where the player is in order to shoot him.
snippet.name: Update Player Position

snippet.desc: This Behavior will handle the player's walking movement while on the ground.
snippet.description: This Behavior will handle the player's walking movement while on the ground.
snippet.name: Walking

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the right.
control.name: _MoveRightKey

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the left.
control.name: _MoveLeftKey

number.desc:
How fast should the Actor get up to speed?

default = 85
number.name: _Acceleration

number.desc:
Maximum speed while walking

default = 20
number.name: _MaxWalkingSpeed

boolean.desc:
Should the speed of the Actor be limited to
the maximum speed specified?
boolean.name: _LimitSpeed

boolean.desc: Does the actor initially face the right direction?
boolean.name: _InitiallyFacingRight

snippet.desc: Modified version of Fade Out and Die for use with particles and other recycled actors.
snippet.description: Modified version of Fade Out and Die for use with particles and other recycled actors.
snippet.name: Fade Out and Recycle after Time

number.desc:
The time in seconds it takes for the actor to begin fading out.

Default: 1
number.name: _StartFadingAfter

number.desc:
The amount of time in seconds it takes the actor to fade all the way out and die.

Default: 3
number.name: _FadeTime

snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for detecting when the player is falling, and playing the proper animation.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for detecting when the player is falling, and playing the proper animation.
snippet.name: Falling

snippet.desc: Creates dust particles behind the actor as he runs.
snippet.description: Creates dust particles behind the actor as he runs.
snippet.name: Create Dust

number.desc: Delay between creation of new tracers (in seconds).
number.name: _Delay

boolean.desc: If this is true, a tracer is currently being created.
boolean.name: _CreatingTracer

snippet.desc: Gives actor the notion of Health.
snippet.description: Gives actor the notion of Health.
snippet.name: Health

number.desc: Decrements by this amount if the colliding actor did not specify a damage amount.
number.name: defaultDmg

number.desc: Current health of this actor.
number.name: currHealth

number.desc: Upper bound for health.
number.name: maxHealth

number.desc: Starting amount of health. Can't exceed max health.
number.name: initHealth

actor.desc: Don't let the same actor cause multiple damages to happen.
actor.name: actorCache

boolean.desc: Make this actor die when its health reaches or falls below 0.
boolean.name: dieOnDepletedHealth

number.desc:
The amount of time the Actor will be invulnerable after being hit.

Value of 0 (zero) means that the Actor will never become invulnerable.
Value > 0 means that the Actor will be invulernable for that many seconds.
number.name: tempInvulnerabilityTime

number.desc:
The amount of time to wait before the Actor can be hit by the same Actor it just collided with.

Value of 0 (zero) means that the Actor can't collide with the same actor twice, unless it collides with another actor first.
Value > 0 means that a collision with the same Actor can not occur for that many seconds.
number.name: sameActorCollideAfter

snippet.desc: Spawns the Actor Type of your choice when this Actor dies. You can specify the X & Y offset relative to the main Actor, as well as the lifetime of the spawned actor before it dies. Useful for death animations.
snippet.description: Spawns the Actor Type of your choice when this Actor dies. You can specify the X & Y offset relative to the main Actor, as well as the lifetime of the spawned actor before it dies. Useful for death animations.
snippet.name: Spawn Actor upon Death

number.desc: Horizontal offset from the original actor
number.name: xOffset

number.desc: Vertical offset from the original actor
number.name: yOffset

number.desc: How long should the actor stay alive before disappearing?
number.name: lifespan

snippet.desc: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Always Simulate

snippet.desc: Allows this actor to damage another actor through a collision.
snippet.description: Allows this actor to damage another actor through a collision.
snippet.name: Inflicts Damage

number.desc: Amount of damage to inflct.
number.name: damage
